ccpn.AnalysisScreen.lib.MixturesGeneration module¶

ccpn.AnalysisScreen.lib.MixturesGeneration.getAlphanumWellPosition(wellSize=96, columnSubgroup=False, subgroupSize=4)[source]¶
Parameters

  • wellSize – int: one of the common Well: [6, 12, 24, 48, 96, 384, 1536, 3456]

  • columnSubgroup – bool: False default. Only used for well >= 1536.

Returns

list of tuple (row value, column number) The alphanumeric well position on a plate:

96-well plate coordinates range from A1 to H12 384-well plates coordinates range from A1 to P24 1536-well plates coordinates range in groups:

  • A-H with 4 subgroup of rows and 1-48 columns

    AA01 to AA48, AB01 to AB48 … BA01 to BD48…

-With columnSubgroup set to True:

A-H with 4 subgroup of rows and 1-12 columns each of 4 subgroups: first row:

AA11-AA14; AA21-AA24; AA31-AB34 … AA121-AA124

… last row:

HA11-HA14; HA21-HA24; HA31-HA34 … HA121-HA124
